alert.note: Alert for Niihau in Kauai (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 28 at 3:34PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM HST THIS EVENING FOR THE ISLAND OF KAUAI IN KAUAI COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The island of Kauai in Kauai County. * WHEN...Until 645 PM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. Dangerous flows over low-water crossings. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 333 PM HST, radar indicated heavy rain moving onshore of western Kauai with rain fall rates up to 2 inches per hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kekaha, Princeville, Kokee State Park, Alakai Swamp Trails, Na Pali State Park, Polihale, Mana, Waimea, Barking Sands, Haena, Wainiha, Hanalei and Waimea Canyon State Park. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 645 PM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding.
